form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION BY INDOCHINESE REFUGEE FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE, Form Approved OMB No. 4-39056

full_text: IMPORTANT Please read before filling out application. Use typewriter or print in pen. Do not leave any question unanswered Screened by NARA, 8/29/2023 When appropriate insert "nane" or "not applicable". If you need mora space to answer fully any question on this form use a separate sheet of paper this size, and identify each answer number of the corresponding question. Form Approved APPLICATION BY INDOCHINESE REFUGEE FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OMB No. 43-R0595 DATE RECEIVED File Number A 21 293 871 Applicant for benefits of SECTION 101 OF 1977 THE ACT OE Section 101 of the Act of October 28. 1977 Section 103 of the Act of October 28, 1977 OCTOBER 28, Section 104 of the Act of October 28, 1977 DO NOT WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE, SEE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE FILLING IN APPLICATION. IF YOU NEED MORE SPACE TO ANSWER FULLY ANY QUESTION ON THIS FORM, USE A SEPARATE SHEET AND IDENTIFY EACH ANSWER WITH THE NUMBER OF THE CORRESPONDING QUESTION.
